quote_cn: 弗洛伊德說過 "愛情和工作 就是生活的全部"
quote_en: Freud said, "Love and work. Work and love. "That's all there is."

quote_cn: 我退休了 我的妻子已經過世了 可想而知 我有了很多的空閒時間
quote_en: Well, I'm retired, and my wife is dead. As you can imagine, that's given me some time on my hands.

quote_cn: 我的妻子已經去世三年半了 我無時無刻都在想念她
quote_en: My wife's been gone for three and a half years. I miss her in every way.

quote_cn: 而退休? 則要堅持不懈的努力 提升創造力
quote_en: And retirement? That is an ongoing, relentless effort in creativity.

quote_cn: 首先 我承認我享受其中的新鮮感 有點像在逃學一樣
quote_en: At first, I admit I enjoyed the novelty of it. Sort of felt like I was playing hooky.

quote_cn: 我用所有省下來的航空英里數去環遊世界 問題是 無論我去了哪裏
quote_en: I used all the miles I'd saved and traveled the globe. The problem was, no matter where I went,

quote_cn: 只要我一到家 那種無處可去的感覺 如千斤重錘般向我襲來
quote_en: as soon as I got home, the nowhere-to-be thing hit me like a ton of bricks.

quote_cn: 我意識到了 這一切的解決方法就是不斷前進
quote_en: I realized the key to this whole deal was to keep moving.

quote_cn: 早晨起床 走出家門 去到某個地方 任何地方都可以 無論晴雨 我都會在7:15準時到星巴克
quote_en: Get up, get out of the house, and go somewhere. Anywhere. Come rain or shine, I'm at my Starbucks by 7:15.

quote_cn: 不好意思 我可以坐這裏嗎? 嘿 最近怎麼樣?
quote_en: Excuse me, mind if we join you here? Hey, how are ya?

quote_cn: 我也解釋不來 但這讓我覺得我也是其中的一份子
quote_en: Can't explain it, but it makes me feel pan' of something.

quote_cn: 今天要見的人 並不是精於數字的人 別跟他們講數據
quote_en: These guys today, they're not numbers guys. Don't talk figures with them.

quote_cn: 其它時間用來做什麼呢? 做各種事情 高爾夫 讀書 看電影 皮納爾撲克
quote_en: How do I spend the rest of my days? You name it. Golf, books, movies, pinochle.

quote_cn: 試過瑜伽 學過廚藝 買了一些盆栽 上過中文課
quote_en: Tried yoga, learned to cook, bought some plants, took classes in Mandarin.

quote_cn: 相信挖 挖什麼道試掛了 翻譯過來就是... "相信我 我什麼都試過了"
quote_en: Xiang xin wo, wo shen me dou shiguo le. Translation, "Believe me, I've tried everything."

quote_cn: 然後 當然 也會有葬禮 能做的事比我想像得多得多
quote_en: And then, of course, there are the funerals. So many more than I could imagine.

quote_cn: 最近我唯一的一次旅行 是去聖地亞哥 看望我的兒子和他的家人
quote_en: The only traveling I do these days is out to San Diego to visit my son and his family.

quote_cn: 他們很好 我非常地愛他們 但是說實話 我想我可能有點
quote_en: They're great. I love 'em to pieces. But to be honest, I think I probably relied on them

quote_cn: 太過依賴他們 別誤會我 我不是那種經常悶悶不樂的人
quote_en: way more than I should. Don't get me wrong, I'm not an unhappy person.

quote_cn: 正相反 我只知道我的生命中有個空洞
quote_en: Quite the contrary. I just know there's a hole in my life,

quote_cn: 而我需要補好它 還得盡快
quote_en: and I need to fill it. Soon.

quote_cn: 今天我離開超市的時候 眼角掃過的一張傳單吸引了我的視線
quote_en: Which brings me to today, when I was leaving the market and caught your flyer out of the corner of my eye.

quote_cn: 唔 "老人家 來當實習生吧"
quote_en: Hmm. "Seniors, be an intern."

quote_cn: 本 我一眼就看到你了 嗨
quote_en: Ben, I thought that was you. Hi.

quote_cn: - 嘿  - 你在看什麼呢? 我想這是某個網絡公司在招老年實習生
quote_en: - Hey.  - What'd you find? I think an Internet place is looking for senior interns.

quote_cn: - 我沒理解錯吧?  - 我來看看 "申請者必須年滿65週歲...
quote_en: - Am I reading this right?  - Let me see. "Applicants must be over 65 years of age,

quote_cn: 有組織能力 對電子商務有興趣" 管它是什麼...
quote_en: have organizational skills, a genuine interest in e-commerce," whatever that is,

quote_cn: "並且要幹勁十足" 合身靚衣網
quote_en: "and a roll-up-your-sleeves attitude." AboutTheFit.com,

quote_cn: 不就是那個... 沒錯 沒錯 沒錯
quote_en: isn't that the outfit that was... Yeah, yeah, yeah.

quote_cn: 他們買下了紅鉤區的一間舊工廠 我女兒說他們是在網上賣衣服的
quote_en: They bought one of those old factories in Red Hook. My daughter says they sell clothes on the Internet.

quote_cn: 他們是怎麼運作的 我完全沒概念 你需要上傳你的申請
quote_en: How that works, I have no idea. Well, you have to upload the application.

quote_cn: 這會很有挑戰的 聽聽這個... "求職信太老掉牙了
quote_en: That could be challenging. Listen to this, "Cover letters are so old-fashioned.
